summary: When a devastating boat crash shipwrecks a group of friends in the jungles of an uncharted island, they are savagely picked off one-by-one by a cannibalistic enemy that evolution forgot. A ... See full summary »
cast: Jewel Staite|Justin Baldoni|Marc Bacher|Nikki Griffin|Kellan Lutz|Helena Barrett|Mohit Ramchandani|Rhianna Vigrass|Terry Notary|Andrea Esquivel|Felipe Salazar|Jefferson Arce|Aysha Morales|Nestor Morera|Wilberth Salazar|Jason Whisman|Kyle Cowgill|Wil Daniels
title: La isla de los caníbales
